title: Waabi’s new simulator could scale autonomous vehicle tech faster - TechCrunch
content: Waabi’s new simulator could scale autonomous vehicle tech faster  TechCrunch
description: Testing autonomous vehicles on public roads is an expensive and time-consuming endeavor, and one that Raquel Urtasun, former chief scientist at Uber ATG, doesn’t think is the most expedient route to market. Waabi, Urtasun’s self-driving truck technology startup that launched last June, has co…
